setup.title: Setup Wizard
setup.description: Configure local tools like FFmpeg and local LLMs.
setup.tauriOnly: This step requires the Tauri desktop app.
setup.logs.title: Logs
setup.apiKeys.description: Add one or more API keys. The first entry is the default.
setup.ffmpeg.description: FFmpeg is required to convert audio files for local playback.
setup.ffmpeg.installWin: Windows: choco install ffmpeg or download a static build.
setup.ffmpeg.installLinux: Linux: sudo apt install ffmpeg / sudo dnf install ffmpeg
setup.remoteWhisper.placeholder: Optional: configure remote Whisper in Settings > API Keys.
setup.remoteLlm.placeholder: Optional: configure a remote LLM in Settings > API Keys.
setup.localWhisper.placeholder: Local Whisper via whisper.cpp or openai-whisper CLI.
setup.localWhisper.downloadHint: Stores the model locally and sets the path automatically.
setup.localWhisper.installMac: macOS: brew install whisper-cpp or pip install -U openai-whisper
setup.localWhisper.installWin: Windows: pip install -U openai-whisper (requires Python + ffmpeg)
setup.localWhisper.installLinux: Linux: pip install -U openai-whisper or build whisper.cpp
setup.localWhisper.modelHint: whisper.cpp requires a model file path (GGML/GGUF).
setup.localLlm.description: Local LLM runs via Ollama on your machine.
setup.localLlm.ollamaHint: Runs models via the Ollama server on 127.0.0.1.
setup.summary.title: Summary
setup.summary.note: You can re-run the wizard any time from Settings.

settings.enrichments.title: Prompt Templates
settings.enrichments.description: Manage output templates and prompts for transcript enrichment.
settings.enrichments.name: Name
settings.keywords.title: Keywords
enrichment.prompt.smart:
Create smart notes in Markdown with clear section headings:
- Summary (3-5 bullets)
- Decisions
- Next steps
Rules:
- Use only information from the transcript.
- No inventions, no filler.
- Keep each bullet short.
enrichment.prompt.tasks:
Extract all action items as a list.
Rules:
- One task per bullet.
- Include owner/date/status if mentioned.
- No duplicates, no extra context.
enrichment.prompt.meeting:
Create structured meeting notes in Markdown:
- Summary
- Key points
- Decisions
- Action items (with owner/date if mentioned)
- Open questions
Rules:
- Use only transcript facts.
- Keep it concise.
enrichment.prompt.email:
Draft a short professional email based on the transcript.
Structure:
- Subject
- Greeting
- 3-6 sentences summary + next steps
- Closing
Rules:
- Do not invent facts.
keywords.defaultPrompt:
System / Instruction Prompt

You extract keywords from spoken language.

Rules:

Return only a valid JSON array (no explanation, no Markdown).

Each keyword is a single string without line breaks.

Normalize:
- no punctuation
- no filler words (e.g. "yeah", "well", "today", "then", "still")
- no duplicates
- prefer nouns or fixed noun phrases
- no partial words or truncated tokens
- max 3 words per keyword
- 4-6 keywords
- order: most important -> less important

Example:
Text:
"Today we have pizza and a green salad."

Output:
["Pizza","green salad"]

Text:
{{TRANSCRIPT}}

errors.noAudioCaptured: No audio captured. Please check microphone input.
errors.audioRetryUnavailable: Audio file not available for retry.

errors.offlineMode: Offline mode is enabled. Disable it to use cloud processing.

errors.missingLlmKey: Missing LLM API key in Settings.
